mapper.select: select rm_id, rm_lift, rm_date, rm_type, rm_user, rm_login, rm_login_addr, rm_logout, rm_logout_addr, rm_url, rm_description from db_lms.record_maintenance where rm_id = #{rmId}
select rm_id, rm_lift, rm_date, rm_type, rm_user, rm_login, rm_login_addr, rm_logout, rm_logout_addr, rm_url, rm_description from db_lms.record_maintenance limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into db_lms.record_maintenance(rm_lift, rm_date, rm_type, rm_user, rm_login, rm_login_addr, rm_logout, rm_logout_addr, rm_url, rm_description) values (#{rmLift}, #{rmDate}, #{rmType}, #{rmUser}, #{rmLogin}, #{rmLoginAddr}, #{rmLogout}, #{rmLogoutAddr}, #{rmUrl}, #{rmDescription})
mapper.update:
update db_lms.record_maintenance
rm_lift = #{rmLift},
rm_date = #{rmDate},
rm_type = #{rmType},
rm_user = #{rmUser},
rm_login = #{rmLogin},
rm_login_addr = #{rmLoginAddr},
rm_logout = #{rmLogout},
rm_logout_addr = #{rmLogoutAddr},
rm_url = #{rmUrl},
rm_description = #{rmDescription},
where rm_id = #{rmId}
